sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState, nextContext){ console.log(this.props.match.params.vid) axios.get('https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/'+ this.props.currentId) .then((response) => { this.setState({ response : response.data }) }) } render() { console.log(this.props.match.params.vid) return (
